Reviews.Title: Soaking Wet
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kit and battery in December when it arrived the contents we soaked. The camera solution leaked and Amazon replaced the wet contents. When the 2nd package arrived the bottle soaked all the contents AGAIN!It's obvious the solution needs to be shipped in a container separately. I gave up on ordering a 3rd replacement knowing that the solution was obviously going to leak.Please replace your envelopes for new containers designed to ship liquid and solutions.

Reviews.Title: 2nd purchase of product
Reviews.Author: mary jo
Reviews.Content: Wait, dont let the title chase you away. This is the second purchase of the same product because I like the product. I now have one in each camera bag and in each car I have the car charger. The batteries give me enough charge for me to charge a full battery while I use the second. I am a professional photographer starting out and I Have to have a quick way to charge my batteries in the field and this product will do just that.

ProductInfo.Features:
• (2) LP-E8 Long Life Batteries
• AC/DC Turbo Charger w/ Travel Adapter Plug
• Mini tabletop tripod  • Lens cleaning fluid • Cleaning cloth
• 2 universal screen protectors • 5pc cotton swabs
ProductInfo.Name: Complete Deluxe Starter Kit for Canon EOS Rebel T2i T3i T4i T5i 550D 600D 650D 700D KISS X4 X5 X6i DSLR Camera + 2 LP-E8 Batteries + AC/DC Turbo Charger
